mapper.select: SELECT /* FileManageDAO.selectFileInfs */ A.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.FILE_SEQ , B.PHY_PATH , B.SAVE_FILE_NM , B.REAL_FILE_NM , B.FILE_EXTN , B.FILE_DSC , B.FILE_SIZE , A.REG_DTM FROM CO_FILE_MST A, CO_FILE_DTL B WHERE A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID AND A.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.FILE_SEQ

SELECT /* FileManageDAO.selectFileInf */ ATCH_FILE_ID , FILE_DSC , FILE_SEQ , PHY_PATH , SAVE_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTN , REAL_FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
SELECT /* FileManageDAO.selectParentFileCnt */ COUNT(*) FROM CO_FILE_MST WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}

SELECT /* FileManageDAO.selectImageFileList */ A.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.FILE_SEQ , B.PHY_PATH , B.SAVE_FILE_NM , B.REAL_FILE_NM , B.FILE_EXTN , B.FILE_DSC , B.FILE_SIZE , A.REG_DTM FROM CO_FILE_MST A, CO_FILE_DTL B WHERE A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID AND A.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND UPPER(B.FILE_EXTN) IN('GIF','JPG','BMP','PNG') ORDER BY B.FILE_SEQ
SELECT /* FileManageDAO.getParntFileCnt */ COUNT(*) FROM CO_FILE_MST WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}
SELECT /* FileManageDAO.getMaxFileSeq */ NVL(MAX(FILE_SEQ), 0) + 1 AS FILE_SEQ FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}
SELECT /* FileManageDAO.getFileListCnt */ COUNT(ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{value} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
